name: Rupture (Loïc da Silva, Star5lash, Wreath, Benoit Gauthier, Le6barbare)
name_original: Rupture (Loïc da Silva, Star5lash, Wreath, Benoit Gauthier, Le6barbare)
description:
When you open your memory box, you find all these things that marked the key moments of your past...

Gather your recollections and look back on your life with fresh eyes.

Game created for the New Jam 2019

Theme : You have your whole life ahead of you • Time : 72 hours

Loïc da Silva : Game Design, Narrative Design, Sound Design & Project Management

Benoît Gauthier : Game Design, Narrative Design, UX Design & UI Design

Sophie Almecija : Game Design, Narrative Design & Game Art

Guillaume Lamourec : Game Art

Francis Fournier : Programming

Clément Patricio : Programming
